basic_information.scholarship_name: Maxine Prather Endowed Scholarship for Elementary Education

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education & Professional Studies majoring in Elementary Education. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to any student who has declared Elementary Education as their major Must have completed 9 semester hours of elementary education coursework Overall minimum GPA of 3.0 Provide (2) letters of recommendation Provide personal statement outlining why they desire to become a teacher Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
